messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Japanese Fonts
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kanji doesnt shoow up in my email, but I can see it on web pages etc. Maybe the way my email is set up with Yahoo. otjhers may have the same problem pAUL
messages.messageBody:
Hi

Kanji doesnt shoow up in my email, but I can see it on
web pages etc.

Maybe the way my email is set up with Yahoo. otjhers
may have the same problem

pAUL

--- "Kitsuno <cewest@...>"
<cewest@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
It looks like Japanese fonts (SHIFT-JIS) do work (you
just need
japanese fonts installed), at least they do show up on
the messages
on the yahoo page:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/samuraihistory/
They might not show up in the emails.
FYI.


Samurai Archives: http://www.samurai-archives.com

messages.messageBody:
It looks like Japanese fonts (SHIFT-JIS) do work (you just need
japanese fonts installed), at least they do show up on the messages

They might not show up in the emails.
